Title: Our Brand Is Crisis
Writer: Rachel Boynton (suggested by the documentary), Peter Straughan (screenplay)
Actors: Sandra Bullock, Billy Bob Thornton, Anthony Mackie, Joaquim de Almeida
Plot: In 2002, Bolivian politician Pedro Gallo hires American James Carville's political consulting firm, Greenberg Carville Shrum, to help him win the 2002 Bolivian presidential election. GCS brings in Jane Bodine to manage the campaign in Bolivia. Battling her arch nemesis, the opposition's political consultant Pat Candy.
